List example of a Storybook Story.


This storybook has multiple scenes. Here we can see the same component under multiple conditions all at once, so we can verify how it looks.


Should it have the attribute set or should it be set to a lot of data? Should the component be narrow or wide or fit to the screen? etc.


(This is for demonstration purposes only. Typically, we would only use storybooks locally and not publish to an org.)


For more information, please see the documentation HERE.
